name: Grav-Ball
description:
GRAV-BALL is the new insane sport. 

inside the grav-ball arena players are in conrtol of time manipulation, giving them a sense of zero-gravity.

as a rookie, its your goal to not only score goals but to look graceful doing it. 

you can build your score and your audience all at once. 

different sized goals give different scores. 

better snapped poses can earn you bigger scores.

snap poses and snag goals is what Grav-balls all about. 

Score 500 points and 500 social points to win the game.

This is my first en-devour into coding and my first solo game-jam.

feedback is highly appreciated. 

I hope yous enjoy thank you.    :) 

Both windows 32 and 64bit are included in download
